name: Queer Cherry Pop Slots
description:
This is a PC or MAC browser game. For a mobile game go here:  https://longjohn.itch.io/dildo-up

Enjoy this one of the kind slot machine with gay art. Play "Queer Cherry Pop" to gather experience and unlock more games with every experience level. 

You can launch it in full screen using the button in the bottom right of the game. Press ESC to exit full screen.  In case of any issues, just refresh the browser with F5. Your progress is saved so you can always play later.

Wild symbols replace any other. Scatters need to be at least three anywhere on the screen to give you free spins. Get a bonus every 2 hours, in case you ran out.

Have fun spinning those dicks!
